hero.title: The AI that speaks Bamanankan
hero.subtitle: ekodi is a living project. The model is learning, growing, getting better every day. And you can be part of that journey.
hero.leitmotiv: ekodi is here. And it speaks your language.

features.title: What ekodi can do
features.voice_desc: Speak in Bamanankan or French. ekodi listens, understands, and responds naturally, like a real conversation about anything.
features.translate_desc: Switch between French and Bamanankan effortlessly. Text in, text out. Accurate and fast.
features.tts_desc: ekodi doesn't just write. It speaks. Natural Bamanankan voice, clear and expressive.
features.api_desc: Add Bamanankan intelligence to your own apps, bots, or services with a simple API.

demo.title: See it in action

api_showcase.title: Integrate Bamanankan AI
api_showcase.subtitle: A simple REST API to bring Bamanankan intelligence into any application.

impact.title: Why ekodi changes everything
impact.stat_speakers_label: Mandekan speakers in West Africa, including 14 million Bamanankan speakers
impact.farmer_desc: A farmer who can neither read nor write can now ask about weather, market prices, or farming techniques, simply by speaking their language. ekodi gives access to world knowledge to those who were excluded from it.
impact.institution_desc: Governments, NGOs, public services: build AI-powered agents that speak the language of the majority of your population. Inform, assist, and serve in Bamanankan.
impact.equality_desc: African languages are underrepresented in AI. ekodi bridges that gap by building a concrete model for Bamanankan and paves the way for millions of Mandekan speakers.
impact.company_desc: Companies, startups, brands: reach millions of people without worrying about the language barrier. Integrate ekodi to communicate, sell, and support your customers directly in Bamanankan.

story.proverb: The ɲiɔ planted after all the others grows faster and surpasses them all.
story.desc: In Bamanankan culture, Sambala ɲiɔ is the millet planted after all the others. Yet it grows faster and stands taller than them all. ekodi carries that spirit: a modern, proactive, and adapted vision that overcomes barriers faster and more effectively. We have built a concrete, usable model available today. Together we will make it better. Join us and lend a hand to build the best LLM in Bamanankan: ekodi!

project.label: Work in progress
project.title: ekodi is a project, not a finished product
project.desc: The model is actively being trained and improved. Responses may not always be perfect, and that's where you come in. By using ekodi and sharing your feedback, you directly help train the AI to become better at Bamanankan. Be patient, be honest, and help us build something great together.

pricing.title: Free while we build together
pricing.subtitle: 10 free prompts to test ekodi. Your feedback during this phase is what helps us train and improve the model.
pricing.inactive_note: These plans will be available soon

feedback_cta.title: You are training ekodi
feedback_cta.subtitle: This is not just a chatbot, it's a model that learns. Every time you rate a response, correct a translation, or flag an error, you are directly contributing to training the AI. ekodi gets better because of people like you.
feedback_cta.note: We know ekodi isn't perfect yet. That's the point. Help us make it the best Bamanankan AI in the world.
